name: The eyes should be washed(Farvardin)
description:
The eyes should be washed.It must be seen differently
(SOHRAB SEPEHRI)
In this collection, I have tried to show that the type of view and angle of view related to different issues of this world has a direct impact on the formation of our final mentality towards that issue, and in many cases this haste and not examining all angles of the issue leads to It becomes an incomplete and incorrect image in our mind and finally our wrong judgment ...
I dedicate this collection to all the men and women of this planet whose souls have been repeatedly bitterly and painfully raped: wrong and hasty judgments ...
This collection  has 12 works and each work has 4 Editions taken From the number of months and seasons of each solar year(In the coming days, the works of other months will also be minted)
For the loved ones who start collecting from this collection, that is, collecting the first edition of each of these 12 months, and also for the loved ones who collect more than two works from this collection, from my next collection, which I will present soon, and single works A fractal version and a digital painting will be received as a gift...
collection:MP4 60FPS 1080P( Digital painting+genereitive art 3D)
